text: aur hamane yahoodiyon par tamaam naakhoonadaar jaanavar haraam kar diye the aur gaay aur bakaree donon kee charabiyaan bhee un par haraam kar dee thee magar jo charabee unakee donon peeth ya aaton par lagee ho ya hadadee se milee huee ho (vah halaal thee) ye hamane unhen unakee saraqashee kee saza dee thee aur usamen to shak hee nahin ki ham zaroor sachche hain
